actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to prohibit any reduction in the monthly benefits of a fully insured individual, who is otherwise entitled to old-age insurance benefits, by reason of any outside earnings which may be received by such insured individual.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Prohibits any reduction, by reason of outside earnings in the old-age insurance benefits of an individual who is entitled thereto under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to prohibit any reduction in the monthly benefits of a fully insured individual, who is otherwise entitled to old-age insurance benefits, by reason of any outside earnings which may be received by such insured individual.
